casebody.data:
Richard E. GLOSSIP, et al., petitioners,
v.
Kevin J. GROSS, et al. No. 14-7955 14A796. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 28, 2015.

Opinion

Respondents' application for stays of execution of sentences of death presented to Justice SOTOMAYOR and by her referred to the Court granted, and it is hereby ordered that petitioners' executions using midazolam are stayed pending final disposition of this case.
